Are you ma perfect g/f??

1) How old are you??
a) 10-13
b ) 14-15
c) 16-17
d) 18-19
e) 20+

2) What colour hair do you have?
a) Blonde
b ) Brunette
c) Ginger
d) Black/Dark
e) other

3) What colour eyes do you have?
a) Blue
b ) Brown
c) Hazel
d) Green
e) I don't have eyes!

4) Which football team do you support?
a) Man Utd.
b ) Liverpool
c) Chelsea
d) Arsenal
e) Other

5) Would you stick up for me if your friends didn't like me?
a) Yes, always
b ) Mostly
c) I don't know
d) Never, my friends are my friends

6) What kind of music do you like?
a) rnb/rap/hip-hop
b ) indie
c) dance/club/trance
d) rock/emo etc. etc.
e) other

7) Would you stay loyal even when I'm away?
a) Yes, always
b ) Mostly
c) I don't know
d) Never, If your not there, I do not care!

8) Would you be there when I need you most?
a) Yes, always
b ) Mostly
c) I don't know
d) Never, your problems are your problems!

9) Would you ever keep a secret from me?
a) Never!
b ) Maybe sometimes
c) I don't know
d) Yes, what you don't know wont hurt you!

10) What is your favourite colour? (couldnt tink ov anyting else! lol)
a) Red
b ) Blue
c) Pink
d) Yellow
e) other

Chinese 4 beginners!

Chinese for beginners!!
1) That’s not right.....Sum Ting Wong
2) Are you harboring a fugitive.....Hu Yu Hai Ding
3) See me ASAP.....Kum Hia Nao
4) Stupid Man.....Dum Fuk
5) Small horse.....Tai Ni Po Ni
6) Did you go to the beach?.....Wai Yu So Tan
7) I bumped in to a coffee table......Ai Bang Mai Fa Kin Ni
8) I think you need a face lift.....Chin Tu Fat
9) Its very dark in here.....Wao So Dim
10) I thought you were on a diet.....Wai Yu Mun Ching
11) This is a tow away zone.....No Pah King
12) Staying out of sight.....Lei Ying Lo
13) He's cleaning his automobile.....Wa Shing Ka
14) Your body odor is offensive.....Yu Stin Ki Pu
15) Great....Fa Kin Su Pah
